详情: Lightweight cotton blend material: Our streetwear-inspired pants are made from a lightweight cotton blend, ensuring ultimate comfort and breathability throughout the day.
Relaxed fit for comfort: Designed to fit relaxed to the body, these pants offer a comfortable and casual style, allowing you to move freely while maintaining a trendy look.

Large double pockets: With our pants, you'll never have to compromise on storage. They feature large double pockets, providing ample space for your essentials while adding a functional touch to your outfit.

Trendy orange lacing and dropdown belt: Add a pop of color to your streetwear ensemble with our orange lacing and dropdown belt. These stylish details elevate your look, making it perfect for a cool and fashionable vibe.

Baggy design for a contemporary edge: Embrace the baggy trend with our pants. The relaxed, baggy design adds a contemporary edge to your outfit, allowing you to effortlessly stand out and make a fashion statement.
